kernfrasen: walked all the way round the sacred Mount Kailash
assaults on the barricades of the oppressors

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: The message itself, unleashed, was racing around the Mediterranean on its own power.

cognitieve_implicaties: The message has agency independent of the speaker.
Human effort is secondary to the word's own momentum.
theologische_implicaties: Sola Verbum: The Word performs what it says.
ethische_implicaties: The preacher's duty is to 'release' the word, not to 'make' it work.
onbedoelde_consequenties: May lead to passivity in strategic mission planning.

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher revitalizes the 'Word' by giving it physical, kinetic energy (racing, unleashed) rather than treating it as a static text.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The sermon is built on a singular grammatical/conceptual pivot: God as the Subject vs. God as the Object. Every metaphor used (journey, capital, barricades) is systematically subordinated to this Subject/Object distinction.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The preacher uses the 'Order of the Sentence' (Grammar) to re-interpret the physical act of 'Hearing' as a passive reception of a 'Message' (Objectified Word).

sterktes.beschrijving: Re-activates the dead metaphor of 'hearing' by tracing it back to the concrete 'message' (semu'a).
sterktes.voorbeeld: It makes no sense to say, 'Lord, who has believed our hearing?'

risicos.beschrijving: By moving human capacity to the 'margins altogether,' there is a risk of fatalism.
risicos.voorbeeld: The power that removes human 'spiritual' capacity to the margins altogether.
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregants may feel their personal engagement with faith is irrelevant.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: A New York intellectual dinner party/luncheon (secular, sophisticated, disdainful).
sub_worlds: The slopes of Mount Kailash in Tibet
The academic world of Luther Seminary/Duke
The biblical world of Isaiah and Paul

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: Highly effective in bridging 'human doing' with 'divine speaking'.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: By insisting God is the grammatical subject of the life of faith.

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Critiquing the 'spiritual journey' and 'spiritual capital' metaphors.
verstoorde_schemas.vervangend_schema: Faith as a Gift/Creation of the Word.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Strongly aligns with the Lutheran 'Proclamation' schema where the sermon is a means of grace.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon brilliantly identifies the 'Spiritual Journey' as a potentially toxic source domain when it centers on human effort. It successfully replaces 'Faith as a Path we Walk' with 'Faith as a Message that Finds Us.' The dominant landscape is linguistic and grammatical, using the structure of language to mirror the structure of reality.

revitalisatie_suggesties.huidige_status: Often treated as a static book (Dead).
revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Lean further into the 'Racing' and 'Unleashed' imagery to emphasize the Word's agency.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The Word is a runner who doesn't get winded by our silence.

coherentie_verbeteringen.incoherentie: The tension between 'preaching' (human act) and 'message' (divine act).
coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Clarify that the preacher is the 'conduit' or 'trumpet' rather than the 'author'.

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: If God is the only subject, humans are merely objects (puppets).
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Introduce the metaphor of 'Witness' to give humans a participatory but non-sovereign role.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To bridge the gap between 'Message' and 'Hearing' without making it a work of the will.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in cognitive homiletics that uses grammar as a metaphorical lens to correct a dysfunctional theological schema.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: Instead of praising the stories' vividness, CMT reveals how the 'Journey' metaphor in the Tibet story creates a 'Works-Righteousness' schema.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Moves beyond 'experience' to the cognitive mapping of 'subject/object' relations.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: CMT identifies that the preacher's frustration with 'spiritual journeys' is actually a rejection of the 'FAITH IS A HIKE' mapping.

volledige_metafoor_lijst: Luther and Calvin breathing down our necks
appendices.notities: The sermon is a critique of the 'Therapeutic Turn' in modern preaching through the lens of grammatical agency.
